subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: With Rafael Nadal at home, Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray unsettled and Roger Federer now 33, this could be the right time for a major breakthrough on the men’s side.
snippet: With Rafael Nadal at home, Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray unsettled and Roger Federer now 33, this could be the right time for a major breakthrough on the men’s side.
